website_summaries.verdict: Very comfortable set of gloves that wicks moisture and stretches nicely.
pros: Palm consists of leather to provide good mixture of durability and softness
Very flexible gloves that gives you the feel you need for maximum bat control
Fabric designed to wick away moisture, keeping your hands dry
cons: Some reports of seams ripping after a short time

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking gloves
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking gloves, vibrant color, good feeling to the leather. However, they ripped after 6 games. (These were used by a 12 year old, no sliding, just hitting). After the stitching on the side of the fingers came out and popped on both gloves, we went and bought a $12 pair of Franklins from Wal-mart. These were paying for a brand name, and not quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love the glove!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I use these to keep my hands warm pushing my wheelchair NOT batting. That said, they’re durable, tight fitting without a bunch of extra material and they look good. They don’t have a ton of adhesive grip which is exactly why I purchased them. Assuming you are using them as a batting glove, they provide some good shock absorbsion.
customer_reviews.author: dayo319

customer_reviews.title: Pretty warm and good coverage of touch-screen rubber
customer_reviews.text: I use these when I'm running, which means I'm often pulling out my phone to skip a song, or change apps to view my mileage. These keep my fingers warm (down to about 40 degrees) and there's a decent amount of the touch-screen rubber material that I don't have to constantly try and rotate my finger to try and get my phone to recognize a touch.
customer_reviews.author: Dobeman

customer_reviews.title: Barely lasted a month, then seam came apart.
customer_reviews.text: Well, 2 days after the return window the seam came apart at the tip of a finger, leaving that finger partially exposed. I expected better quality from a brand name like this - it's incredibly disappointing they barely lasted a month. I can get just as much life from a $9 pair of no-name gloves from Academy. Would not buy again, nor recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Use it for Golf
customer_reviews.text: I have used UA batting gloves for years, but have not played baseball since 1993. I use them for golf. A typical golf glove does not fit my hand. If I buy a golf glove to fit my fingers, it soon splits in the palm and if I buy to fit the palm, the fingers are to long. With a golf glove it fits ok and soon reshapes to fit my hand. One pair lasts a year.
customer_reviews.author: oldoakey1940

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but they run a little tight
customer_reviews.text: Nice, comfortable. I found that they run a bit small, but I guess they should be on the tight side. They seem to be well suited for other options as well - golf on a cold day, or bicycle (or motorcycle) riding as well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, but order 1 size larger
customer_reviews.text: Good product, certainly. However, despite not having overly large hands the LG size I ordered is a bit snug and not easy to get on. Once on, they are fairly comfortable due to their stretch, but I would recommend ordering a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Thevenot

customer_reviews.title: Last a month - 1 day a week
customer_reviews.text: These lasted a month and two days. The seems ripped apart on the right thumb already. These fit perfect and feel nice but the quality isn’t good. They should last longer than a month and unfortunately these won’t last you long if you’re going to the batting cages weekly.
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and rugged
customer_reviews.text: These are not only sharp and comfortable, they are functional and rugged, like most UA products.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Kulesh

customer_reviews.title: I am not using for them intended use at all ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not using for them intended use at all. I play cymbals for the Wisconsin Marching Band and they have held up surprisingly well. This is my second pair since the glove gets torn up after months of rigorous abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: However I guess moms taste in style was no good lol he chose a different pair so these are ...
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the brand so I purchased these as a gift. However I guess moms taste in style was no good lol he chose a different pair so these are sitting in a drawer as back up gloves
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these for playing trumpet in marching band practice. His whole section has the same ones and they are really great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: For as expected and such a great value. We just about naught these exact gloves at a chain sports store for $10 more
customer_reviews.author: Ron Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these only twice - and these are already wearing off - rubber is peeling off on the palm side - these are expensive enough to at least last ONE season - 2 games only - wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: ALI R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit to big but all in all great gloves
customer_reviews.author: kevin simmons

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves I used them for driving at work
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves I used them for driving at work. Not sure how they would hold up in baseball. But great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: omar vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Good grip and keeps my fingers from getting dry and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these for the Gym, Good grip and keeps my fingers from getting dry and Chappy.
customer_reviews.author: Rene A Menendez

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: My son plays varsity baseball, he likes them. Hard to get good info out of a teenager...
customer_reviews.author: ppcjoe

customer_reviews.title: Good fit haven’t used them long enough to tell you ...
customer_reviews.text: Good fit haven’t used them long enough to tell you if they wear well or not
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Rozzero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far these are holding up great, matched my uniform too. Hitting bombs with these!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Sibilio

customer_reviews.title: under armor gloves
customer_reviews.text: these gloves, are all that and bag of 🍟chips fit good, I use them for physical use at hospital when I hav too put mental patients in restraints that's my purpose of buyin these nice lookin gloves,
customer_reviews.author: "TIMEUS"

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson, fits as expected and quality is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Owens

customer_reviews.title: They run small
customer_reviews.text: The length is good, bought just like their charts say to, but apparently they make these for thinner hands. Way too small, yet it fits. 👎
customer_reviews.author: CJ Winegarden

customer_reviews.title: looks good and are holding up good
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size, looks good and are holding up good. Great grip, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: MAR

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. Look good. Great for riding and working on stuff in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA

customer_reviews.title: Better off without
customer_reviews.text: Only batting gloves I’ve owned that tore my hands up
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kuroda

customer_reviews.title: When i first got them i was disappointed cause i thought they were too small
customer_reviews.text: When i first got them i was disappointed cause i thought they were too small. Squeezed them on and realized that they were perfect and boy are they sharp looking.
customer_reviews.author: Keeping it real

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for motorcycle riding
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. Really nice for motorcycle riding.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves. I bought the XL
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves. I bought the XL, usually I’m between a L/XL and these fit great. Held up through 1.5 seasons so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: I like the gloves but I ordered dark green and received ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I should give 4-5 stars or 1-2... I like the gloves but I ordered dark green and received bright yellow gloves
customer_reviews.author: J P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these gloves are good quality and fit. i have one season on them and will use again this year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These fit very nice. Comfortable doesn't show signs of ripping .
customer_reviews.author: bmur

customer_reviews.title: The threading is terrible for the money you can find better quality
customer_reviews.text: They fell apart within a week. The threading is terrible for the money you can find better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Product.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about batting but these are great for doing curtains backstage. As a backstage manager I will say rope is sore and give blisters but with these, it just sliced my problems
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband. He loves them and always uses them when he rides his motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Hill

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I was looking for, my kids ripped gloves after 3 games.
customer_reviews.author: Kleyman

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Looks in great condition
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Looks in great condition. Will give as Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Irishnd31

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year-old son loves them. He plays travel ball and the gloves last about one season.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Description and picture were accurate. Fits to size.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Loves the gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Great service - shipping was fast and the product was as expected...thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after light use. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed with these gloves. After less than 3 months of owning them and lightly using them (5 or 6 softball games), the left hand glove ripped completely on the palm. I'm beyond the return window, so I'm SOL. I won't be buying UA products any time soon
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves . Nice color.. Don't think they are durable..
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Fit to size
customer_reviews.text: If you're an xl you're an xl dont try to squeeze into a lg.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should send me another pair
customer_reviews.text: I wore them once’s at my baseball game and they ripped on the side
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Just got in mail today, opened box and put ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got in mail today, opened box and put on just to find out seem is ripped.... very unsatisfied with product... any way of return?
customer_reviews.author: Brian Evans

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Son using it for his Intermediate 50/70 season. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The gloves are super cool and are good if your hands get sweaty ...
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are super cool and are good if your hands get sweaty because it has holes which allow your sweat to ventilate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome company
customer_reviews.text: Awesome.....I ripped my gloves in the first week and they sent me another pair..
customer_reviews.author: enrique duran

customer_reviews.title: so good!
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. I wear XL gloves and bought XL gloves. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Brent A.

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE YOUTH GLOVES
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware! The gloves are nice; HOWEVER, these are YOUTH sizes, not MENS. I even emailed the seller to make sure they were MENS, and received assurance that they were indeed Mens. However, when they arrived, they were Youth. This happened to me twice. I will find another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great product, delivery was 3 days late but all ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product , delivery was 3 days late but all in all pleased.
customer_reviews.author: chuck ritz

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are made poorly and tore right open after two days of minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: zachary pardun

customer_reviews.title: Honestly you're probably not getting more than year of use before they break down but the cost is reasonable enough and I enjoy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Under Armour batting gloves for the last few years. Honestly you're probably not getting more than year of use before they break down but the cost is reasonable enough and I enjoy having a new pair each season. They're flexible right away with no break in period.
customer_reviews.author: NMaize

customer_reviews.title: These fit incredibly small I normally wear a large but ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit incredibly small I normally wear a large but needed an XXL and even those are a bit tight, and I have average sized hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. They do run a little small but I was actually hoping for that. Can't wait to step up to the plate to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Surrey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE YOUTH SIZES!! THE ONES I ORDERED WERE ANYWAY.
customer_reviews.author: Shara

customer_reviews.title: Next time I will buy them at a Sporting Goods like Dicks or Sports Authority
customer_reviews.text: You! AMAZON sent me large batting gloves not extra large fit but really tight. Needed them for my next game didn't have time to send them back. Next time I will buy them at a Sporting Goods like Dicks or Sports Authority.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Go one size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Order 1 size up from what you normally ware. My friend ordered wrong size by mistake but I ordered large because that’s what I normally ware. These were a bit tight to get on but friend needed the large ordered an xl so we Swiched our no harm no faul .
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Favorite gloves. Looks great. Fits great especially being an officer knowing you have to touch alot of germs.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great baseball
customer_reviews.text: Hoooorrrraaaayyyy baseball! I got a bunch of hits and even more high fives and the gloves were great.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Bunda

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Clean-Up VI Batting Gloves
product_meta.description:
HeatGear on back of hand wicks sweat, dries fast & adds 4-way stretch. Embossed synthetic overlays add support, structure & grip without losing flexibility. Goatskin leather palm delivers soft comfort & needed durability. Palm side finger perforations deliver extra ventilation. Internal locker tag for personal customization. Sold in pairs.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :6 x 4 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces
 * Item model number :1267426
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :September 24, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Under Armour Accessories
 * ASIN :B015QQ1470

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #205,868 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #160 inBaseball & Softball Batting Gloves 
    *  #18081 inOutdoor Recreation Clothing 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars185 ratings HeatGear on back of hand wicks sweat, dries fast & adds 4-way stretch. Embossed synthetic overlays add support, structure & grip without losing flexibility. Goatskin leather palm delivers soft comfort & needed durability. Palm side finger perforations deliver extra ventilation. Internal locker tag for personal customization. Sold in pairs.
feature_bullets: HeatGear on back of hand wicks sweat, dries fast & adds 4 way stretch
Embossed synthetic overlays add support, structure & grip without losing flexibility
Goatskin leather palm delivers soft comfort & needed durability
Palm side finger perforations deliver extra ventilation
Internal locker tag for personal customization
